name: Nostalgia: an Anzu/Madara visual novel
description:
An Ensemble Stars!! fan visual novel made for the Main Round of ESO by Team Anzu/Madara.

Anzu is having a hard time of brainstorming live show ideas when a bunch of mysterious objects show up. Flashbacks ensue.

Writing - Lee & Ai

Art - June, Yuuria, & Lee

Backgrounds - Vy

Code - Ai
